definition: to ignore/to brush off/to dismiss/to pay no attention to

sentences.english: But as a private individual, I just ignore such people.
sentences.chinese: 但如果我是作爲個人，對這種人我就根本不予理睬。

sentences.english: The organizer will not pay the design cost of disqualified design schemes.
sentences.chinese: 無效成果文件的設計機構，主辦方將不予支付成本費。

sentences.english: She put her dreams by for a while.
sentences.chinese: 她把夢想放在一邊，不予理睬。

sentences.english: Traditional teaching to lecture-based, non-simulation exercises before surgery.
sentences.chinese: 傳統教學以講授爲主，不予術前模擬練習。

sentences.english: The committee wouldn't even look at my proposal.
sentences.chinese: 委員會對我的提議甚至不予考慮。

sentences.english: We are certainly not recognizing such a fantastic claim.
sentences.chinese: 對如此荒唐的要求，我們自然不予承認。

sentences.english: City Planning Board for planning permission and acceptance without formalities.
sentences.chinese: 其中市規劃局將不予爲其辦理規劃許可和驗收手續。

sentences.english: RUBBER STAMP SIGNATURES OF THE BENEFICIARY ON DOCUMENTS ARE NOT ACCEPTABLE。
sentences.chinese: 蓋有受益人橡皮圖章的單據將不予接受。

sentences.english: Accrued income will never be taxable.
sentences.chinese: 應計收入將不予應稅的。

sentences.english: The case was dismissed in the absence of any definite proof.
sentences.chinese: 此案因缺乏確鑿證據而不予授理。

sentences.english: He just laughed, and dismissed the question as unimportant.
sentences.chinese: 他只是笑了笑，認爲問題無足輕重而不予考慮。

sentences.english: No record-keeping may be conducted for those applications that fail to meet the requirements upon examination.
sentences.chinese: 備案申請經審覈不符合要求的，不予備案。

sentences.english: Meanwhile we shall not and could not comment on anything regarding our customers.
sentences.chinese: 同時對於任何有關客戶的事物，我們不能也不予置評。

sentences.english: She blames a culture that shuns criticism for the drop in standards. "It's the media, " she says.
sentences.chinese: 她指責現在不予批評的風氣，降低了標準。

sentences.english: The influence of the by-pass flow on the unconfined aquifer is little and even could be neglected.
sentences.chinese: 繞滲在潛水含水層的作用則小得多，甚至可不予考慮。

definition: (to do sth) separately/as a separate action
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
to regard the same as/to regard as being the same as
to counter accusations/to protest/to remonstrate/to retort/to plead/to demur/a plea (of not guilty)/a defense (against an allegation)/to enter a plea to a charge (in a law court)
to have the right to/to be entitled to/to have authority/powerful
